Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1979...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1984, off Fredrick Nottingham (HAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/1984, off Joe Cureton (PEN)...
Injured on 5/6/1984 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Third Base in 1984...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1987, hitting .385 with 4 HR, 24 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1987, hitting .563 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 7/7/1987...
